FuncDef: This command configures the BGP keepalive timer. A keepalive message is sent every time this timer expires. Thesecondsparameter can be set at three levels: global level (applies to all peers), group level (applies to all peers in peer-group) or neighbor level (only applies to specified peer). The most specific value is used.

ParaDef.Info: The keepalive timer in seconds, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 21845.
